review: Love it! Best new home addition
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome product! Works as expected. Wish there were more apps on it but it seems that Amazon is continually adding more.
author: Matt C

review: It's OK. I thought this would be faster than my Roku 2, and it is. But I primarily bought this device for Sling TV, and the remote isn't ideal for this use. Roku's was WAY better. The speed is a big plus, but the interface is not my cup of tea.

review: Love it! Keeping very basic cable for news, but what a $ saver.

review: Much better than the chrome cast streaming device

review: HDMI quality, other than nearly needing to destroy the remote to get the battery in it was easy to install, set up and use.
